评论详情: These are a bit thinner than I anticipated, but they are still warm and cute looking. My feet didn't get overly warm even having a sock liner underneath.
Love these little socks they fit perfectly under winter booties.

评论概述: They are so warm! And cute.
评论详情: I’m very happy with my socks and ordered more. It’s been colder this winter and my feet are freezing in my Colton socks. I was hesitant to buy socks with wool in them as that wool socks were itchy and scratchy. I’m living my new socks, they are so warm and comfy. And I wear a size 5.  So I was worried they would be too long.  I washed them in hot water, dried them on high heat. They shrunk to fit almost perfectly.  I would say that anyone with smaller feet would be able to shrink these to fit.  Otherwise wash them in cold if you don’t wear a smaller size.  They are great socks for the price
love these socks. I've purchased several times. Money well spent
Super comfy and look cute with boots
Nice and warm.
These socks are very big and slouchy.  Only one size available though. I'm size 8.

评论概述: Thin socks unlike last past identical purchase
评论详情: I purchase these every year as I wear them very often. This year the socks are thinner I had to double check to make sure I ordered the same ones and in wool blend, found out the first time ordered was another brand but the last time i ordered it was this brand in 2022. Quality is not as good as past years and doesn't provide as much comfort in my boots. I think there is less wool in them too if any at all. They feel different, smooth, and i can see through parts of them. Good light socks, but not the thick i was expecting. The last time was 5 stars. Product description should be updated to reflect their change.

I bought these for three people, for two years in a row and ALL THREE talk about how warm and comfortable they are, all the time. They wear them all year long as I see them all on a regular basis. They look great and go with so many things. HIGHLY Recommended!!!
Very pretty patterns, fit comfortably and feel very soft and comfy.

评论概述: These are the best! So comfy!
评论详情: These socks are so soft, warm and comfy! I love these!!!
The socks are thick warm and cozy wear its a perfect fit these socks are good quality I will stick to these
These socks have been great.  They are very comfortable and have held up great to washing and drying.  Will be getting more colors to try.
These socks are great. They’re soft and comfortable. They have a great feel. I have shared them with family members since purchasing.

I’m a size 9.5 and these socks are massive in the foot area and tiny in the ankle area. Every step I take my feet slide around in the socks. I have no idea who these are going to fit but it’s not me. I would not recommend.
Not long enough, uncomfortable material.
Great socks and delivery time!

Very pleased with how these socks are toasty warm without being too thick to wear inside regular shoes. The patterns are cute also. I think I would like if they were a little bit longer the make sure there's no cold air that can sneak in between my socks and my pants.  The weirdest part is 1 of the socks in the pack (not even a pair, literally 1 single sock) is noticeably smaller and tighter than the rest. The threads start cutting into me because there's not enough space to fit around my heel and the top of my ankle! All the others fit fine though so not sure what happened on that one sock.
These socks are a great quality. The fit is as I expected it to be. They are super soft and comfortable. They wash well also!
Gave to a homeless shelter. So warm for them

评论概述: It SAYS wool but really, it's not wool
评论详情: Hate to break it to you but these are cotton.  VERY small amount of wool involved, if at all.I can feel these cotton socks wearing thin even as I put them on!  They are cute and all but maybe search out real wool socks if you need warmth.

I was surprised by how thin these socks are! I have a couple of thicker wool socks, so I was expecting a similar experience with these. But no! These may be thinner, but they're just as warm and toasty as my other, thicker pairs. I will definitely purchase these again!

评论概述: Loose threads inside and has no grip
评论详情: Cheaply made. Loose threads inside makes it look cheap. Has no grip. Very thin and not warm at all.

评论概述: Had to throw them all out!
评论详情: Look just like pictures and soft. Huge issue is it comes apart first wear! Literally unravels from top. Very disappointing because I was going to get every color. Would not recommend this at all. Don’t have a picture because I threw them all away as I was so embarrassed my socks were falling apart while I was out.

Comparing different styles, are Loritta socks worth it?  Trying to find medium-weight wool socks that are warm without being too bulky. Harder than one would think, many sellers offer the exactly same socks under various brandnames.  STYLES PURCHASED: Loritta Design Style Warm (this listing) very loose knitting, not warm, see-trough when stretched, NO reinforced heels and toes. Returned. Loritta Multicolor 08n (this listing)very cute and the multicolored pattern knitting makes them thicker, but unfortunately that doesn’t apply to heels and toes, here they are very thin and see-through, can see my toes, NO reinforced heels and toes. Returned. Loritta Retro StyleZ (this listing) loose knitting, overall thin, didn’t even open the package, Returned. Loritta Multicolored(thickened) https://a.co/d/b2I2mdz these are good, and I would only recommend buying the styles that have “thickened” in the name. Not too thick, not too thin, but unfortunately had some knitting irregularities, maybe just a bad lot? Returned.  I’m still looking, I sure like Falke Walkie light and Falke TK2 and similar, but was trying to find something less expensive, as I need a bunch. Loritta socks and comparable are not worth it in my opinion (except the “thickened” styles maybe). It would be nice if they would switch to tighter knitting and reinforced heels and toes. I would rather just get 3 pairs instead of 5 pairs, but better quality.
nice length but loose around the toes
Very pleased with these socks. I wanted something comfortable and breathable and these hit the sweet spot.
These socks are so comfy and the colors are fab! They come just above you ankles! Love them so much I purchased two pks!!  Not super thick or thin. Perfect
Warm beautiful socks that wash and dry well.
These socks are different from the description. they run too big. the quality is not good and not warm.

评论概述: Great quality, soft and not itchy, perfect boot or lounge socks!!
评论详情: Love the heathered look, colors, softness, quality, warmth, and non-itchiness of these socks!! The packaging was exceptionally well done and I really appreciate the reminder that you need to wash to fluff them up.

I've been buying the 5-pack wool blend socks off Amazon every couple years for a decade, getting slightly different color designs each time. The socks were previously consistent in quality and construction.  By comparison, these were very thin, felt like the wool percentage was lower, and they are HUGE. The sizing says for 5 - 9. I'm a 7 shoe, 7 1/2 boot size, and these socks are almost 2 inches longer on the foot than my previous socks.  They were purchased with a discount, so it's not really worth returning them. They will be going to a family member with bigger feet.

I bought the modern tonality design with cables. Though they're soft and a nice color, they're way too big and have no elasticity. They slip right down, and if I don't have shoes in, slip off. With shoes, they bunch into the shoe at the toes. I wear size 7.5 shoes, so pretty average. These could fit my husband, and even then, would probably still slip down.
Claims to be rag wool socks, but not like any other rag wool socks I have ever had. Not thick . Not warm.
Great product.  Great service.
These are nice and warm, and cozy. Pretty color options. Comfortable and not too small, just right.

评论概述: I probably won't wear these much...
评论详情: The material used for these socks is uncomfortable compared to other socks. It doesn't have the stretch and give that you expect from a sock, and not very soft. In fact they are distractingly tight around the lower ankle for me - I wear a size 10 Womens. (I think if I wore an 8 or smaller, these would be fine, but they'd still feel cheap.) Because they aren't stretchy, they are difficult to pull up around my ankle. But, given the price it's not worth returning nor a huge surprise. They are super cute just like in the product listing, such a shame!

评论概述: Nice and cozy for Indiana winters
评论详情: These socks are soft and warm. They fit my 9W feet very well. They didn't slip or slide down my leg. Just ordered another package of these since I was so pleased with them!
I was looking for thick winter socks, something like merino/smart wool and these are not it. Pretty thin socks overall, not very soft.

These are some of the most basic cheap socks you can buy that are this type of category I have absolute reservation that it has 100% zero wool in them! These are literally something you would get off of Temu. They don't even come stating they are wool they state nothing on them they are so cheap and basic. Having said that, I gave them three stars because they are comfortable and soft.

I bought these because they had great reviews and because the ones I wanted were no longer available.  They are pretty thin for what I was expecting. They had wash directions for "fluffening" them back up from package shipping, but they really didn't change. The sock isn't very flexible and fits pretty rough. I have size 8 feet and I think anyone with larger feet would struggle to feel comfortable in these socks.

评论概述: Thin and not for small feet
评论详情: I have small feet (women's size 5.5-6 US) and these did not fit, with the seam lying on my foot really uncomfortably. I also found the fabric to be quite thin and not very soft.

It says these socks are thick— I do not find them thick and am disappointed with that. I wore them in the house today and my feet did not stay warm. Overall I did not find them as good as I had hoped.

I ordered the same socks from the same seller a year or so ago. Same color pattern/design since I liked them so much. Decided to order another pack and they are definitely not the same. Really disappointed. Even though the design is the same, they are super thin. Definitely not the same quality and seem really cheap. When I ordered them before they had some thickness and warmth to them. They were the perfect thickness and warmth. I won’t be ordering again. Waste of money.
I have bought these several times and love them so much. They’re cozy and warm but still breathable. Highly recommend!
These socks are extra comfy and cozy. Very well made and fit great 😃
Took a week to get this item but it was NOT the sellers fault. Amazon has been way behind  in delivery & I have prime. These are Great socks.  2nd time buying them.
Look so nice and I love the colors! They come a few inches above my ankle bone, they are not tight on me, but I have small ankles.  It was a great deal,
Socks are thinner than expected
Wash and dry just fine. Don’t make my feet sweat but keep my feet and ankles warm. I hate cold ankles. Definitely worth the purchase and the colors are beautiful.
These socks are ok, somewhat thinner than I was hoping. Nice colors and stitching looks good.
These were purchased as a gift. Very thin and cheap quality.

评论概述: Very thin and flat, more polyester than wool, too large
评论详情: Advertised as wool socks.  They have some wool, more polyester.  They are thin, not thick as advertised.  The socks were shrink wrapped with instructions on the packaging saying they would fluff up after washing.  Not true.  They are still flat and thin.  They were way too large for women's socks.  I bought them for a Christmas Gift Exchange and the person that received them made fun of them and gave them away.  I was horrified.  I feel like I was deceived.  I will never buy from this merchant again.
These are nice socks, comfortable but I wish they were higher, hence 4stars.
A bit thin for cold Wisconsin winters but perfect for doubling up with a heavier wool sock. Made well
There were no details on the package to indicate what they are made of but it’s not wool. They are very thin and short
I bought these socks for my daughter to wear on cold days.  She really loves them.  They are a fun and cute style, soft, and warm.  The socks stay in place and maintain moisture retention.
Gave them to my sister for the holiday. She rates them 10/10 for comfort and warmth. Though they have wool in them, they are not itchy at all.
Bought these socks last year-heavy socks, perfect for winter. This year they aren’t heavy, really thin. Looks just like the previous part but cheap.
Warm and comfy and not huge and bulky…… perfect!
Socks are soft

I wear wool blend socks I don’t think these have any wool. They are extremely loose fitting. Very poor quality. I’m sending them back.
Cute socks but much too thin to wear as boot socks, they’re about the thickness of a dress sock that you’d wear with heels and a pant suit.
These socks are everything I hoped for. They are pretty in a variety of colors and keep my feet toasty. They also wash and dry well. Very pleased!
Super cute very comfy! Great buy!
Great for warmth..& well made holiday socks & price is 2nd to none.
The socks are very soft and comfortable, light and comfortable

I got the Fair Isle socks, and while they are warm and beautiful, they are too short and too tight around the top band.  They would be good for a tiny woman or a young teenager.  I gave mine to a very small thin neighbor lady.
Good quality and reasonable price make this product a winner.
Bought for a gift. Cheap thin socks. Threw them out.
Don’t stayup
These are much thinner than I expected for wool socks. The quality seems ok but I'm not sure how warm they'll be.
Very thin, rough material. Not at all what the description and pictures portrayed.
I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of these socks. Just the right thickness and warmth and the colors are lovely.

I was looking for socks that were calf high and these are perfect. Not too tight, and they stay up. Wish it was easier to buy the color you wanted without having to buy an already preset mix of colored socks available.
Just as pictured. Warm and comfortable.  They do stretch out a bit, but not bothersome.
Material feels like the soft reusable grocery bags. Not even warm
Good guality
Not ordering socks or slippers from Amazon again.
These socks are some kind of synthetic material no way are wool!
They are thin and very loose.  Sock slide down to my ankles.  Colors are nice.
Not soft at all. Appears to be warm, colors are heathered.

As a young mom, I rarely “treat myself” to new clothes and have been wearing my husband’s socks for years. I bought these in October 2024 and writing this in December 2024. I have gotten 3(!!!) holes in these socks in less than 2 months! Not even wearing them every day. I am so disappointed because I wanted to like these socks. Do not buy these, they are so cheaply made apparently.
Didn’t care for the packaging
They feel nice but are HUGE in every direction. Will not stay up.
These are great.  Very warm and not too thick.  Perfect for winter.

评论概述: Thin, a hole in one, small
评论详情: Tried on one sock and it started to unravel from a hole in the top part of the sock.  It was also too small for my women's shoe size 8 .  Very poor quality.  Returned right away.
These socks are nothing like described.  They are very very cheap very thin. Poor quality over all
They look just like the picture and they are oh sooo soft! Feel great on the feet and keep feet warm.

评论概述: Size large only goes to a 9 shoe! Too small!
评论详情: Tried to stop order but said contact seller. When contacting seller I was told to contact Amazon. This was to be a gift sent to receiver. Now they will be burdened with a return as they will not fit.
It seems ok. It is thinner than I was expecting. The size is good.  The app is not allowing me to upload a picture of it.

The good: the colors are lovely and sucked me in.  The bad: almost everything in the listing title is incorrect. These are socks and they are crew lengtht. But they are not warm winter thick soft cozy socks. I also have serious doubts about wool content.  The socks are shrink-wrapped. OK. Fair enough. According to the package instructions: "The product you receive may be squeezed and you can restore fluffy state by hand washing."  Nope. The cuffs managed to 'fluff' up a bit, but the rest of the sock remained flat - also stretched out of shape. Also note: "Hand wash." The ad says machine wash, but I have my doubts that the socks would survive more than one or two washes. One of the socks that I hand-washed developed a notable hole in the knit.  About the fibre content: honestly, these feel most like cheap cotton socks. I can feel every weave on the bottom of my feet. Annoying and uncomfortable. Not soft. Not in any universe would these be soft.  Basically, these are cheap, thin, rough, cotton socks. I have absolutely zero confidence in the durability of these socks beyond one wearing. I can't tell you for certain, though, because they are just too uncomfortable to wear even once.  Save your money.  * I know I sound cranky. Sorry. Mostly I am annoyed with myself for thinking that I could decent socks for $3/pair. So this is your reminder in case you need it: we do get what we paid for.

评论概述: Stretched out of shape after one wear
评论详情: Looked good after washing but stretched out of shape after first wear. Not very comfy.

评论概述: poorly made, runs small, uncomfortable material
评论详情: The material was almost like string - and there was a loose string/thread in the pair I tried on. The socks also ran small. Strangely, okay around the ankle, but tight around my foot.
These socks look great, but they don’t keep your feet warm, and the quality isn’t as expected.

评论概述: Cute but the material not so much...

They look very nice. I’m giving them as Xmas gifts. Friends love socks as a gift. Keep you updated.
Socks are made for fall warmth, but not for winter cold.  I returned them.
I love these they are very colorful and comfy. Not as thick as I expected but I can always wear 2 pair! Great deal!
